com.L3MON4D3.voc5.UI

Class GalleryActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.L3MON4D3.voc5.UI.LoadingInfoActivity
        • com.L3MON4D3.voc5.UI.VocActivity
          • com.L3MON4D3.voc5.UI.GalleryActivity

  • public class GalleryActivity
extends VocActivity
    Displays all Vocabs and serves as a gateway to all main functions of the App. Users can select Vocabs and learn/edit/delete them. Displayed Vocabs can be filtered and sorted.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.L3MON4D3.voc5.UI.VocActivity

      • repSelActionOnRange

        public void repSelActionOnRange(GalleryCard first,
                                GalleryCard second)
        Repeats Last select-Action on Cards between first and second.
        Parameters:
        first - GalleryCard, may be before or after second.
        second - GalleryCard, may be before or after first.

      • repLastSelAction

        public void repLastSelAction(GalleryCard gc)
        Repeats Last select-Action, eg deselect if !lastActionSelect, else select.
        Parameters:
        gc - GalleryCard that will be selected.

      • selectActionRepFromLast

        public void selectActionRepFromLast(GalleryCard gc)
        Repeats last Select Action from last selected Card to Card gc (inclusive). if there is no last selected, simply selects gc.
        Parameters:
        gc - GalleryCard.

      • deleteBtn

        public void deleteBtn()
        Deletes all vocabulary that is selected and updates gallery
